About

I'm full stack developer and can design websites/UI as well, focusing on usability principles and standards.

I'm passionate about designing and building simple websites that create a good user experience and usability

While I love working mostly with UI, I also enjoy getting involved in back-end development.

Currently working as Java web developer (focused mostly on backend) in Chennai, India.
